method.name: Modified Diverse Density algorithm

reference.ref: X. Xu, Statistical learning in multiple instance problems, Ph.D. thesis, Department of Computer Science. University of Waikato, Tauranga, New Zealand (2003).

generalDescription.type: Classification model based on Diverse Density algorithm
generalDescription.objective: To determine a classification model for multiple instance learning based on Diverse Density (DD) algorithm.
generalDescription.howWork: Fit is a variant of the DD algorithm in which the bag-level class probability is computed as the average of instance-level class probabilities. This probability is used at training time, when the likelihood is maximized based on the gradient descent, and at testing time, when a class label is assigned based on the class with maximum probability.

parameterSpec.param: filterType: The filter type for transforming the training data.
